statement.tex:
\text{Find}\frac{dy}{dx}\text{ of the following}\\
\sin^2 y + cos xy = \pi

step.tex: \text{After diffrentiating the equation we get}\\ \frac{d(\sin^2 y + \cos xy)}{dx}=\frac{d(\pi)}{dx}\\ \Rightarrow 2\sin y \cos y \frac{d(y)}{dx} - \sin xy . \frac{d(xy)}{dx}=0\\ \Rightarrow \sin 2y\frac{dy}{dx} -\sin xy .\bigg(x . \frac{dy}{dx} + y \frac{dx}{dx}\bigg) = 0\\ \Rightarrow \sin 2y \frac{dy}{dx}-x\sin xy \frac{dy}{dx} -y\sin xy = 0\\ \text{After rearranging, we get}\\ \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{y\sin xy}{sin2y - xsin xy}\\
